ygData.subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Latest Patch
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow THE Kailyn?  The same fellow from the old eq.stratics board?  The guy who discovered the STA/HP formula & the Agi/AC formulas? If so its darn good to hear
ygData.messageBody:
Wow THE Kailyn?  The same fellow from the old eq.stratics board?  The
guy who discovered the STA/HP formula & the Agi/AC formulas? If so its
darn good to hear from you again.  I learned alot of what I needed to
know about warrioring from that board.
Erm... Never thought of myself as THE Kailyn, but yeah its me. I did do the AC/Agi and Stm/HP though, I had help, especially with the second. I got lucky and someone else saw the pattern in the data and I am the one who got the credit. And if you ever catch Kailyn on Povar, she is a woman.
 
I indeed was part of the great warrior sitout (I think the first
sitout). I remember Fitty, Ruatha & all the other Stratics guys egging
all the warriors on to particpate (things really were hard on early
warriors).   I was laughing when over your story about bronze...I myself
did not get full bronze until lvl 24 (?) if I remember right.  Heck I
used dual Mino Axes until lvl 18 (then had to get a combine long sword
to kill undead in Unrest).
Yeah that was the first sit out. I was not over at Stratics yet. I was on one of the other baords. I can't remember the name of but they are dead (atleast to me) due to really bad software. I jumped over to Stratics well after that. I actaully have a piercing skill because a friend of mine got me a pair of Crys Knives (4/20???) magic for Unrest. I was "Ruatha" swapping them with my Mino axes when fighting magical mobs. Ahh the good old days.
BTW another great warrior weapon to add to the "uber" list you mentioned
is the bloodpoint 10/21 procs an 80 pt hp txf & is not lore (drops in
Howling Stones).  I have 1 of these at the moment & with werwolf form
see 8-9 procs a fight.  My goal in life (other than get to lvl 56 &
riposte) is to obtain another.
Actually it was more of my point that weapons have gone completely insane in the upgrades to the game. I mean 9/25 was a good weapon when I got my whip from Hate. Now it is so much garbage...
Good to hear from you bro

Flair Shieldrender
54 Champion
Fennin Ro
EQ addicted since 3/22/99

For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!
LOL now Kailyn was born 3/21/99.
